mapper.select: SELECT C.RECRUITMENT_ID , C.USER_ID , C.COMPANY_NAME , C.COMPANY_ICON_URL , C.RECRUITMENT_URL , C.RECRUITMENT_TITLE , C.DDAY , C.REGDATE , C.MODDATE , C.LOCATION , C.CAREER , C.EDUCATION , (CASE WHEN RBU.USER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS BOOKMARKED FROM RECRUITMENT C LEFT JOIN ( SELECT RECRUITMENT_ID, USER_ID FROM RECRUITMENT_BOOKMARK WHERE USER_ID = #{loginUser.user_id} ) RBU ON C.RECRUITMENT_ID = RBU.RECRUITMENT_ID ORDER BY C.RECRUITMENT_ID DESC LIMIT #{cri.amount} OFFSET #{cri.startNum}
